snippet: Lazard said on Thursday that it had hired Larry Slaughter, who was most recently a co-head of North American investment banking for JPMorgan Chase, as a vice chairman for investment banking.
abstract: Lazard said on Thursday that it had hired Larry Slaughter, who was most recently a co-head of North American investment banking for JPMorgan Chase, as a vice chairman for investment banking.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Lazard Hires Slaughter, a Former JPMorgan Deal Maker
